alert.note: Alert for Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 12:23PM EDT until April 08 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Grand River near Comstock Park affecting Kent County. Red Cedar River At East Lansing affecting Ingham County. Thornapple River Above Hastings affecting Barry County. .Water from heavy rains earlier in the week continue to work through the rivers in West Michigan. The crest on the Grand River is expected to pass through the Grand Rapids area this weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red Cedar River At East Lansing. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of low lying areas, adjacent parks, and farmland. At 8.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of the Michigan State University athletic fields. The Potter Park Zoo parking lot in Lansing begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 AM EDT Friday was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 4.9 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.5 feet on 01/10/2008. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr.
